originalText.text: Great place to gain experience in the field

text.text: Great place to gain experience in the field

originalText.text: Just an all around great feeling once you walk in and you get that sense of helpfulness vibes from everyone who works there. This place should be able to get 100 stars for all the work they do for us. Needing help shouldn't make you feel ashamed as we all come across though times. At least the Center for Urban Community helps you stand tall, with them.

originalText.text: CUCS is an amazing agency. Well-structured and has a lot of competent professionals who know what they're doing. They strive to train their employees in all possible areas and are always welcome to feedback. They work with the clients to find solutions to any issues without being the client down. A truly amazing place.
